thread.title: Social Media Blasts Hillary For Gloating Over Michael Flynn's Sudden Resignation
thread.title_full: Social Media Blasts Hillary For Gloating Over Michael Flynn's Sudden Resignation

title: Social Media Blasts Hillary For Gloating Over Michael Flynn's Sudden Resignation

organizations.name: social media blasts hillary for gloating over michael flynn

text:
Former presidential candidate Hillary Clinton mocked Michael Flynn following his resignation as national security adviser with a tweet about âthe real consequences of fake news.â
The twice failed Democratic presidential candidate shared a tweet in which her former aide Phillipe Reines gloats about Flynn leaving his post.
âDear Mike Flynn & Mike Flynn Jr, What goes around COMETS around. And given your pizza obsession,â Reines wrote.
  Comedian Claims Clinton Begged Him To Release Tape Of Trump Making Racist Remarks Chelsea Clinton Claims She Won’t Seek US Senate Seat Angry Constituents Confront Chaffetz At Utah Town Hall Reines included a link to a Domino’s Pizza job listing in his tweet.
Dear Mike Flynn & Mike Flynn Jr.,
What goes around COMETS around.
And given your pizza obsession… https://t.co/rmyO7wyJKX 
xo
Philippe
— Philippe Reines (@PhilippeReines) February 14, 2017 

Clinton trolled Flynn in another tweet.
 
âPhilippeâs got his own way of saying things, but he has a point about the real consequences of fake news.â
Philippe's got his own way of saying things, but he has a point about the real consequences of fake news… https://t.co/a02sXiaHfp 
— Hillary Clinton (@HillaryClinton) February 14, 2017 

Clinton and Reineâs tweets are in reference to Flynn Jrâs tweet about #Pizzagate, Clintonâs alleged ties to Comet Ping Pong Pizza, a Washington pizza restaurant that is purported to be at the center of a network of Satanists and pedophiles.
Pizzagate began when WikiLeaks started to release emails that proved Comet Ping Pong owner James Alefantis had links to Clinton and Clinton campaign manager and longtime friend John Podesta.
  Trump’s   Supermodel   Building   Flynn Jr. lost his job as a Trump aide after proclaiming in a tweet that the allegations surrounding Clintonâs ties to the alleged sex trafficking ring should not be overlooked.
Until #Pizzagate proven to be false, it'll remain a story. The left seems to forget #PodestaEmails and the many "coincidences" tied to it. https://t.co/8HA9y30Yfp 
— Michael Flynn Jr (@mflynnJR) December 5, 2016 

Twitter slammed Clinton for lambasting Flynn.
. @HillaryClinton Clinton crime Family pic.twitter.com/EdmFaFuFKA 
— Fraser Gregory (@Fraser1776) February 14, 2017 

. @HillaryClinton pic.twitter.com/a1wAOY2PZ7 
— #ourRevolution đşđ¸ (@JustAnotherRich) February 14, 2017 

@HillaryClinton The real consequences for you, is that you're going to jail for child trafficking, as are all your friends who are involved.
— Zanting (@Zanting) February 14, 2017 

Following reports that he misled Vice President Mike Pence and other officials of the Trump administration about his contacts with Russia, Flynn resigned late Monday night.
Flynn said in a resignation letter that he held numerous calls with the Russian ambassador to the U.S. during the transition and gave “incomplete information” about those discussions to Pence.
President Donald Trump has named retired Army Lt. Gen. Keith Kellogg, who has beenÂ Flynnâs chief of staff on the National Security Council, to serve as acting national security adviser.
What do you think?
